text: Allah tini'i yini mahakasamandali o prthibi srsti karechena, ara akasa theke barsana karena pani, tarapara tara sahayye tini utpadana karena tomadera jibikara jan'ya phalamula, ara tomadera jan'ya tini adhina karechena jahaja yena tamra bidhana anuyayi ta samudre calacala kare, ara tomadera jan'ya tini basibhuta karechena nadanadi.
